title: 14 day suspension for 1 game Riot's a hypocrite
body:
I could understand 3-5 games in a row or monthly int feeds.

Yet my REPORTS DO NOTHING during my ranked placements. What's this unfairness and disrespect?
Riot who the hell is ruining your game in the background. 

Here's my ticket for you all too see because why not, why keep playing when this keeps happening to me and not two others.


TICKET #36316595
What I don't understand 1 game and you gave me 14 day bullshit!



NHLLABINE
August 22nd 2018, 5:03:16 pm
How much money have I invested to you over the years? Yet for 1 game i didn't feel like playing and played it out due to wasting another 20mins on LPQ. Riot you have disrespected most players who hand feeded you money. Looks like i may have to make an new account over again and the cycle will repeat itself. Out of 2 Games i didn't care for, yet you obviously hit me with the hammer in my recent game. So all 9 kids reported me by the looks of it, yet my reports do nothing of the sort nice caring "Fuck You Riot". If you cannot "clear" the 14 day banned I'm done with your twisted game.

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

Yeah, of course intentionally feeding carries an immediate ban when detected. The money you spent give you zero rights to maliciously throw the game.

I nothing else to really add other than, gj riot, happy to see the system functioning correctly in this case.

You are 2-8 in silver 5, where new level 30s are everywhere. There are plenty of people there who feed without inting because they have no clue as to the difference between normals and ranked, just like you. You don't deserve to talk since you confessed to inting, which makes you literally no better than those you are accusing. The only hypocrite here is you....
You think I'm new smart-ass. i've been playing since Nov 2014. Yet my reports do nothing so in regardless to their poor system <removed by moderation>

Your reports do just as much as the reports against you did - trigger a review of the other players' behavior. But if the player reported did nothing wrong, or their infraction was not so severe to merit immediate punishment, they may be not punished or the game flagged for a later date when they are reported again.

Oh, by the way, the [Boards Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE) require you to have constructive discussion. Telling people to die isn't part of that. Please don't do it again.

That's another person you're talking to, someone who has favorite foods, just like you do. Someone who enjoys videogames, just like you do. And someone who has a life outside of this, just like you do.

Show some restraint. Being upset is perfectly valid but taking it out on people is just pathetic, especially in this manner.

Got a tough guy here.

I can see why you got banned; you clearly have no self-control, respect for others, or any ability to analyze behavior rationally.

Seems like you do give a fuck, considering you are having a pathetic meltdown and  telling people to kill themselves over and over in broken keyboard-smashing english.

Old? Lmao.

You act like a spoiled 16 year old who just got his favorite toy taken away.

Maybe when you are actually old you will learn how to interact with others in a way that makes them take you seriously and respect you. Nobody cares about your pathetic threats.
LOL Do I CARE what you think. I'm 29 and loving where I'm at in my life, besides wasting my time on games like this and WWll.

>I'm 29

Then act like it.

> I'm 29 and loving where I'm at in my life

That's why you spend your free time playing "garbage"? I thought people at our age valued their free time better than that.
"clearly you have no respect for others" while insulting someone XD
hey listen pal, I'm next, wait in line there, buster brown.

Hey, what did i just say. there's a line now.
edit: okay wait, i think you gotta dial it back on this one.
you are embarrassing yourself and fellow Canadians...please stop
I don't know any Canadians that I'm friends with that play this garbage
I'm not sure how you can even pretend that you're the one that being treated unfairly with this kind of attitude.
My support tickets from last year prove this otherwise.
do me next, i'm ready for my 14 day suspension, i've been getting told i was getting reported like clockwork.

You calling me names doesn't magically make you better, just shows you are smaller. It doesn't matter how long you have been playing, your games show a lack of skill. On top of all this, if you have really been playing since 2014 AND have done ranked more than just this season then you would know how nearly every new player gets placed in low silver where you are so you have zero room to talk kid, and you really are the kid by the immature way you are acting...

I get that it's getting heated, but please try to be the bigger person when having discussions. This isn't any sort of formal warning but if you could just maybe try and tone it down a *tad* I'd personally really appreciate it.
Okay.
The fact that it's a smurf account means **you know better and just gave everyone evidence by saying so**......
Probably because you have a really poor definition of what inting is.
(cough) child look through my match history there's only 2 games where i didn't care for.
yeah, exactly.
Yet than again. LISTEN KIDS the report system is fucked up simple as that if my reports aren't going through.

Did you know that the system is capable of filtering false reports?

Based on your attitude you are currently displaying, I'm waaaayyyy more inclined to believe that your many of your reports are false reports.

You also give canadians a bad name.

Your case is a prime example of Riot doing the right thing. Personally, I believe they are being lenient.

Your behavior has been the most foul I've seen someone act on the boards in quite a while, coupled with your intentional feeding in the game, and hypocrisy of your actions. I can't think of a player that deserves to be banned from the game more. Frankly, I would be embarrassed to even be associated with you.

My only hope is that some time in the future you'll remember this tantrum you're throwing and use it as a lesson of how not to act.

always classy to get on someone about them making fun of others while simultaneously insulting said person. 

Nice.

I'm surprised you can even see the plebs you respond to, being so high up on that horse and all....

calling people kids on boards
complains about report system

if you sue'd riot for this report system, even the lawyer would laugh
i hope they send this to the authorities

I mean, you're lying, but that's irrelevant.

Even a single game of intentional feeding deserves a punishment.
Working as intended. Glad riot catches feeders.
I get your anger but I'm not sure what's leading you to call Riot "hypocrites" ?
Sheep on these boards are going to disagree but punishments nowadays have gotten way out of hand and are making people leave the game.

You chose a very poor thread to try to make that point. At the very least, try to make that argument when someone is banned for mild toxicity.

Almost everyone in the game despises intentional feeders, except for other trolls.
"I know they're sheeps by the simple fact that they disagree with me."

"Just because someone who's already in low priority queue trolls and feeds sometimes doesn't mean he should get punished"?

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
It can be fun or cathartic to troll and intentionally throw games, but you picked the wrong game for doing that.  Riot doesn't want you here if thats what you want to do when you game.
